itt.t00154755.mouseserver

Class AppRobot

  • java.lang.Object
    • itt.t00154755.mouseserver.AppServerUtils
      • itt.t00154755.mouseserver.AppRobot
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class AppRobot
extends AppServerUtils
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This is the class that controls the mapping of the accelerometer readings to the cursor on the screen. It's also controls the moveClicked() and KeyPressed() method of the robot object.
    Since:
    26/04/2013
    Version:
    4.06
    Author:
    Christopher Donovan

      • run

        public void run()
        This run() method overrides the Runnable run() method. This method determines if the incoming packet should be sent to the moveCursor() or mouseClicked() method based on the first value in the array. It does this every 100m/s
        Specified by:
        run in interface java.lang.Runnable
